entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
